name: Rob On Board
description:
Hello it's Rob!
I guess you've been studying for a while what's going on inside your computer. But actually, have you ever been inside it?
Because that's where I'll be travel with you! We'll go through the CPU, the audiocard and so on, and we will figure out together how the main components work.

Let's download the game, I'll see you on the I/O gateway! :)

Credits

This project has been developed for the course of Virtual Reality at Politecnico di Torino, by:

Stefano Cataldi
Lorenzo Lanari 
Sofia Iammarino 
Benedetta Mazzetti
Federica Silvestro
